choose.otherwise: select count(*) from board where title like '%${_parameter}%' or contents like '%${_parameter}%'

mapper.select: select b.no, b.title, a.name as userName, b.hit, b.contents, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as regDate, b.user_no as userNo from user a, board b where a.no=b.user_no order by b.g_no desc, b.o_no asc
select title, contents, hit, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as regDate, user_no as userNo from board where no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into board value(null, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, (select g_no from (select ifnull(max(g_no)+1, 1) as g_no from board) as tmp), 1, 1, now(), #{userNo})
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where no=#{no}
